239.movie_plot: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

89.movie_plot: A talented young photographer, who enjoys snapping photos of his satirical, perverted Baltimore neighborhood and his wacky family, gets dragged into a world of pretentious artists from New York City and finds newfound fame.

260.movie_plot: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

218.movie_name: Return of the Pink Panther, The (1974)
218.movie_plot: Inspector Clouseau is put on the case when the Pink Panther diamond is stolen, with the Phantom's trademark glove the only clue.

242.movie_plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

71.movie_plot: Corky, a tough female ex con and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

240.movie_name: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar (1995)
240.movie_plot: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

116.movie_plot: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.

188.movie_plot: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

166.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

272.movie_plot: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.
